description: Flashback to 1975, as Spain's then-prince Juan Carlos plays with his 7-year-old son Felipe.
title: Game of Thrones: Spain's Future King as a Boy Racer
title_page: Game of Thrones: Spain's Future King as a Boy Racer
text:
Breaking News Emails Get breaking news alerts and special reports. The news and stories that matter, delivered weekday mornings.
October 31, 1975: Prince Juan Carlos of Spain plays with his seven-year-old son Felipe in the gardens of Zarzuela Palace in Madrid. Juan Carlos became king less than a month later, following the death of longtime dictator Francisco Franco.
Spain's Prime Minister announced Monday that Juan Carlos is to abdicate after almost four decades as king and Crown Prince Felipe will take over the throne.
